text: Ústí nad Labem (, ) is the seventh-largest city in the Czech Republic. The area has many mountains. The city is where the Bílina and Elbe rivers join. == Twin towns – Sister cities == Ústí is twinned with: * Halton, United Kingdom * Chemnitz, Germany * Vladimir, Russia ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Ústí nad Labem Region
title: Ústí nad Labem
